snippet: Tensions over the role and pay of United Nations peacekeepers have recently escalated, with deeper grievances just below the surface.
abstract: News analysis; tensions over role and pay of United Nations peacekeepers have escalated, and illustrate deeper grievances about the peacekeeping force.
lead_paragraph: Tensions over the role and pay of United Nations peacekeepers have recently escalated, with deeper grievances just below the surface.

headline.seo: What Is the Role of U.N. Peacekeepers?
